website_summaries.verdict: These classic clogs have the wool felt upper and corked sole that has made Haflinger a popular choice.
pros: Good for wearing around the house
Insole helps with back pain and foot pain
Cork foot-bed conforms to your feet
cons: These shoes are very wide and hard to fit for narrow feet

customer_reviews.title: Changes in production location have caused changes to how these fit.  They are not the same as the clogs of years past
customer_reviews.text: I Loved these clogs and have been wearing them for a decade. But Haflinger now is making these in several factories and in several eastern European countries. The fit is inconsistent from one production location to another. I had to return these and pay full price in a specialty retail store where I could try on several pairs from until I found a pair that fit. You will find other reviews that go into detail about this, but the net is that if you have been wearing size X for the last 10 years and order a new pair it will not fit like the last several pairs you bought.
customer_reviews.author: Eppi

customer_reviews.title: New and Not Improved
customer_reviews.text: The description of these clogs on the home page lists them as "HAFLINGER Unisex GZ Clogs, which are apparently intended to fit 38 EU/Women's 7M US and/or Men's 5(D) US. I have a pair of these clogs from back in the day when Women's Clogs and Men's Clogs were two different items, and I loved them. Sadly, these new and (not) improved clogs are wide and provide a sloppy fit, even with fairly bulky socks. I am returning them for a size smaller, although I am not particularly hopeful that this will take care of the problem, since the challenge is the width of the slipper, not the length.
customer_reviews.author: bdv book devotee

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart Already.
customer_reviews.text: I got these last March 2018, don't really wear them that often, I find that they are a little too warm for my feet. The cork is cracking and the sole is coming off the bottom of the left slipper and the right is starting to peel as well. Not impressed at all with this footwear, especially for the amount of money they cost these should not be falling apart so badly given that they aren't worn that much. Customer service had nothing good to say either, after 6 months they don’t care if their is a problem with their products.
customer_reviews.author: thomas ryan

customer_reviews.title: It's all about sole!
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised with the original black tread sole. The later model with the ruffed up beige sole was delivered. When measured side by side with my old pair the top wool is shorter, thereby, you have to work harder to keep the updated shoe on. The cork base of this shoe is not meant to be bent as in squatting and the shorter top may accommodate that issue. But I don't squat on a daily basis, so it's never been an issue for me. Also, the size 40 must be a man's size. I wear a woman's 40. All in all, how very disappointing that Haflinger decided to make changes to a near perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: After breaking them in, you'll be amazed!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of these particular shoes; just a different color this time. They will feel different as you break them in . When new, don't be surprised as to how different they feel with socks and without. My 1st pair will now become outside shoes. The sole design works well on dry, wet and even snow and ice. They provide such great support, your feet and legs will really appreciate that!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable footwear, ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband has teased for years me about my Haflinger clogs, which I have always bought and worn since about 1990. I have foot problems and they are the one thing that always feels good. I wear them in the house year round, and it's like a foot massage when I put them on. SO I finally bought him this pair because he was complaining about foot pain from running 70+ miles a week, and he wears them now too when he's in recovery mode after too much marathon training. He loves them, and I have resisted the urge to tease him. My advice is, don't worry about what they look like, you will LOVE the way they feel.
customer_reviews.author: MGid

customer_reviews.title: Came with dead moths on it
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many Haflinger slippers over the years. The reason for the 2 star review was that one of the slippers came with several dead moths on it that had dried out and gotten moth flakes/powder on one of the slippers. As we all know, moth larvae eat wool. The larvae are small and hard to see. The slippers didn't appear to have been eaten, although I can't see the inside of the slipper. Only time will tell if there are/were larvae on the slippers. I just brushed the slipper with a soft bristle brush and will hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer24601

customer_reviews.title: Just meh.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to sound terrible, people have been extolling the virtues of this shoe forever. I finally bought a pair to use as house shoes. They are just okay. I have been dealing with plantar fasciitis/tendinitis for over 10 years now, and I think I need more cushion in the sole. Not the company’s fault, but this is like waking in a bare floor, I just don’t get it. Super uncomfortable. I bought the correct size for my size 7 Women’s feet, but they are very loose and fall off when going up the stairs. Meh. Would never buy again. This gal needs cushion, I guess!
customer_reviews.author: Decca

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, fit fairly well with socks
customer_reviews.text: My podiatrist advised me to buy these shoes to wear as slippers. They were considerably less expensive than at the local shoe store. Very comfortable, fit fairly well with socks, but a bit loose without. Hope they don't get too loose as they age. I should have showroomed them at the shoe store before ordering. A lot for "slippers" but worth it if they help with the plantar fasciitis. They are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Randy G.

customer_reviews.title: These are warm and the support is what I need for my particular feet.
customer_reviews.text: I really, really like these slippers. The reason for the four stars is that they feel like shoes, i.e., they are not lined with anything fluffy. After wearing them an entire day I want to take them off. I will order some very fluffy socks to give me the softness these slippers lack. I am keeping the slippers because they have the qualities that I need more than a fluffy interior: they keep my feet warm and they have wonderful support.
customer_reviews.author: Higgie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought these on a whim because they’re so expensive but I have always wanted a pair. I wore them all the time in the winter! I wore them around the house as slippers (but more like mega slippers because the cork bottom gives such great arch support) because they’re soooo warm and then I used them to grocery shop or take the dog out to potty. That’s what I loved about these, they look nice enough to go out in public, have enough stability and durability to take outside and they’re comfy and warm to be worn as slippers! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Do your feet a favor
customer_reviews.text: These shoes/slippers are wonderful!! I did order a whole size down according to reviews and they fit perfect. I usually wear an 8 and I ordered a 7. They fit like a glove and will only get better. Seriously, I’m so happy. I have a feeling they’ll last me a decade like so many people claim! Great quality, color is beautiful, support is great, good sole grip. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Wear these shoes year-round indoors & outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Haflinger fan for years. These are the only shoes I wear for after work and on weekends. The felted wool keeps feet comfy in cool and warm weather. Cork soles with rubber tread allow for outdoor use for light duty. Don't settle for the less costly knock-offs. With a comfortable rounded toe box and built-in arch support these stay on the feet nicely and are so comfy. Typically one pair will last for 2-4 years even wearing them everyday. I wear them to grocery shop, walk to the mailbox, do chores around the house & even have hiked in them in dry weather!
customer_reviews.author: Frances in Idaho

customer_reviews.title: My Feet are Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Oh so comfy and warm! I have very high arches and 1 wide foot. This is my first pair of Haflinger clogs. I love them! They fit so well I forget I have them on. I really appreciate the arch support when I’m on my feet on our hard tile floors. The black with zig zag trim is cute. The natural materials are top quality. I also ordered the clogs in grey with pink hearts in the same size and they had way too much fabric and were too loose (I do not wear socks with clogs). I am a 8.5 and the 39 fits great in the grizzly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Nosenbk

customer_reviews.title: Fit is different with each pair
customer_reviews.text: I have found that the fit of each pair of Haflingers is totally different. Some will run very large and some small. I had to order this style in the same size two different times. The first pair was very snug on on the instep of one foot and since I knew they shouldn't fit like that I ordered another pair and they are perfect. I wear a size 10W and a 42 in these. I love these for house shoes and slippers. Have had good luck in the past washing them in the machine on gentle with two or three bath towels and then letting air dry in front of a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn B

customer_reviews.title: Very strange sizes
customer_reviews.text: I'm mystified by these shoes. Well, I'm mystified by a lot of things, but that's a different story... I began by ordering the 38 which, if I can read the size chart correctly, is a woman's 7. I wear a 7 or 7.5 so I started there. They were HUGE. I returned them and ordered a 37 (still too big) and a 36 (too small). So 3 pairs later, I still have no wool clogs, and I give up! Glad they seem to work for so many of you, and sad I can't seem to make them work for me. :(
customer_reviews.author: New England Reader

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable slippers, run large
customer_reviews.text: I had to return and reorder as they run quite large. I usually wear a 9 1/2 or 10, and the 40 ended up fitting. They do run wide as well, I will need to wear socks with them. They are very comfortable, and were recommended by the person who made custom orthotics for me (due to plantar fascitis). They look like they'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this company——They don’t give a s#*$ about customer concerns.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the Grizzly, previously, and was satisfied. A second purchase, however, has been a frustrating experience based on the poor quality of manufacturing and the shoe company’s outright ignoring any customer inquiry. Avid Haflinger
customer_reviews.author: john robinson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of Halfinger footwear. The first was a slipper. It was so comfortable, that I thought I'd try a shoe. I have normal width feet, but since my toes are short the widest part of my foot is close to the front, and therefore medium shoes don't usually fit. This has a large toebox, so it fits perfectly. Forest green color is great for the fall and winter and goes with many things.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harper

customer_reviews.title: sturdy enough to wear with heavier wool socks as well
customer_reviews.text: Comfy! The wool makes them wearable in a lot of weather conditions. Breathes enough to wear with light socks in Fall, sturdy enough to wear with heavier wool socks as well. Arch support is HIGH and this can take getting used to. Construction seems sturdy with good grips on the soles. Soles appear to be real rubber and not the slidey foam that a lot of shoes are using now.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Watch the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6, and have for 40 years. It was recommended that I order a size 37, which would equal a size 6. I debated whether to follow that firm advice, but instead chose to go with what has always fit perfectly in the past. I have had three pairs of these shoes over the years and found that 36 is a perfect fit. So I ordered a 36 and am very happy with my choice. They are warm, comfortable, and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Encelewski

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: The uni-sex generous cut may feel too big or too wide for some. You may need to order down, if you are half size for sure go down not up in size. BEST COMFORT SLIPPER EVER! It is all I can wear now in my all tile floor home. . The foot bed has a raised arch to offer support and the cork sole means inside it molds to the foot over time for a customized foot bed. Wool is kind of water repellent for spills (not as to washing!!) which is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: TracyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Rather sloppy it. Not quite the same quality as ...
customer_reviews.text: Rather sloppy it. Not quite the same quality as the Haflinger wool clogs I've had for 15 years. bought these new ones to have when the old ones finally give out because I'd rather have these than no Haffies at all. I wear them only as house shoes. Made in Poland--don't know if that makes any difference.
customer_reviews.author: zoom

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with quality
customer_reviews.text: Had these for 2 months being used as house slippers. Today the stitching on the trim is coming out. I’m afraid the trim is going detach now. $124.95 I was expecting better craftsmanship. My last pair lasted years with no issues. I’ve passed the return date so I can’t replace them. So I’m kind of stuck with them now The worst part is that I can’t make any contact with Amazon to get help with this order. Amazon please contact me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Comfort and Durability
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I purchased these to replace the beloved but well-worn first pair I purchased 6 years ago to wear as a house shoe. Love the cork sole that molds to the foot and the non-skid bottom. I was so incredibly pleased with the comfort and durability of this shoe. It was only in the last six months of their 6-year tenure of almost daily use that they started to fall apart. I purchased one shoe size larger than normal to accommodate wool socks, but it was a little larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: mamp08Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: New favorite shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I have tendinitis, and plantar fasciitis. I need shoes that offer complete foot support, firmness, and cushioning. I like Birkenstocks, but wanted more cushioning and a roomier heel. These shoes are PERFECT. I took them out of the box, and have been wearing them all day. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A

customer_reviews.title: Unreal quality for this price
customer_reviews.text: After something like 5 years of wearing them every day after work during the evening my husband somehow managed to break one of the soles on his grey pair of these. I kind of cringed at having to replace them because I remember what I paid for them. Imagine how happy i was to find this pair! They are super handsome and the best deal i found anywhere. I highly recommend the brand and the seller. Top quality across the board!!!
customer_reviews.author: LRRE

customer_reviews.title: Haflinger Clogs are a Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He loves them. He prefers the soles on this style. Several times in the second week since we received them he's said how comfortable they are and thanked me for buying them for him. We purchased other styles of Haflinger slippers in the past with hard what looks to be plastic soles. One pair fit perfectly, but after about 18 months the bottoms started cracking. The second pair of the same style was too short, though it was the same size marked on the shoe and box. We sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Sizing guidance (Amazon's women's 7 / men's 5 = size 38)
customer_reviews.text: I just got these so I can't give a clear review - but for those wondering on size: I am somewhere between a US women's 7 and a 7 1/2 (maybe a touch closer to 7). I ordered "Women's 7 / Men's 5" (for the Amazon description) and it fit perfectly. The shoe itself reads "38" inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY CLOGS
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Haflinger clogs that I own. I've used a pair as indoor slippers for several years. I have plantar fasciitis, and have found that my Haflinger clogs feel the best on my feet. I think it's the cork sole - whatever it is, I bought this second pair so I could wear them to work. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Doodlebug7

customer_reviews.title: Loved 'em -- Until I had to clean the scuff marks
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Beware of these shoes on hard floors such as wood! I just spend 6 hours trying to get the scuff marks off the floor. With some success, but they're still there. A nightmare. All the good things I said originally are still true. But if you have the wrong floors, these shoes are lethal to clean up after. Original: I love these for winter days at home. Great support, don't slip on smooth floors, and they're warm. Oh and they look great. I can take these to a meditation retreat where I can't wear shoes and feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B Vermont

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are 2 sizes larger than advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset with these shoes and with Amazon!! These shoes are huge and definitely NOT EQUAL TO US SIZE 5 as advertised!! I wear a US size 6 shoe and EU size 36 (US 5 M) in all other shoes like Birkenstocks which fit great!! Also I’m stuck with these shoes and wasted a lot of money on them because I have been very ill and did NOT know that Amazon only has a 30 day return policy. I will NOT be buying any Christmas gifts on Amazon with such a lousy return policy!! These shoes are actually 2 sizes larger than they say they are!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Support and Warm!
customer_reviews.text: After breaking my ankle this past summer, I needed good support slippers for around the house on my wood floors. My sister in law recommended this brand to me as they are her favorite and oh, I am so thankful to have them! They are warm in our cool house and such great support that my ankle doesn't hurt after the day working around the house. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: D Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Size down if you're woman ordering the unisex Grizly style haflinger house shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that after using the fit guide and purchasing the recommended size, these shoes were too big. I usually wear a women's US 7 1/2 or 8. 8 was recommended. Returning to a Kohl's store was easy and I reordered and had the new size just a few days later. The 7 fit much better. These are unisex women 7/men 5. The quality is very good and they feel awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Something's different
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Haflinger clogs for a long time, usually the Grizzly. This latest clog I bought is sized correctly, the insole fits perfectly with great support as always, but the top of the clog is different. The "cutout", the part with the embroidery, is much too big for my taste. When seen from above, this cutout is a good inch closer to the tip of the shoe. Consequently, it is much looser on your foot. The clog now flip flops around instead of staying snug. Even a crazy high arch won't fill out the space. Someone who has edema will be helped by this new design, but no thick sock will make a "normal" foot fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Scafati

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite winter shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They felt a little loose when I first got them, but now that I'm used to them, they seem to fit perfectly. I love the grey color. They're super comfy and my feet stay warm. I usually wear them with jeans, but I've found myself wearing them to and from yoga as well since they're so easy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nickel

customer_reviews.title: I love these slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers! I've struggled with Plantar Fasciitis on and off for years and these provide support and comfort. With the cork sole, they last forever too and the supportive insole holds up over time. The material keeps my feet comfortable year-round. Cool enough in summer and warm in Winter. I've bought Haflinger slippers for years for the whole family. Every pair I buy is quality-made and long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, so much comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Haflingers. I have one pair that stays inside the house and one that I wear to work. Feet feel great at the end of the day and I'm a school librarian on the move a lot. I have wide feet, usually wear a 7 and found the 37 to fit best. I wanted to buy my mom a pair to replace her Stegmanns. Upon receiving them, she said they were actually more comfortable than her Stegmanns. However, she's a size 6 and the 36 was too big and the 35 too small so I had to send both back. Will have to buy her the Stegmanns instead. Wish they came in half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh......
customer_reviews.text: After having essentially this same pair of wool felt clogs from Stegman for more than a decade (they’re retired to in house only now) I couldn’t be happier. Exceptional comfort and support. They do run a bit wide, probably an effect of the unisex sizing, but still like cloud walking with great support.
customer_reviews.author: D. Portmann

customer_reviews.title: I have order size 40 from Germany and fitted perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: I have order size 40 from Germany and fitted perfectly. This one was manufactured in Slovenia where probably the sizes run bigger. Iwill keep them for Winter when I Have to wear socks. Thanks for asking.
customer_reviews.author: Karenina

customer_reviews.title: A classic, well deserved
customer_reviews.text: The Haflinger clog is wonderful for apres-ski and in cooler climates. The cork-rubber combination can't be beat for support and comfort. Over the years, I get new heels at the cobbler; unfortunately, they don't last as well due to my gait. Also note that the wool stretches after wearing with padded socks, so I have two pairs in the same size to accommodate thinner and thicker socks. That said, a thicker sock softens the heel strike, important.
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Haflingers and my first pair of clogs. I bought these because I have a lot of feet problems and these are so comfortable and I'll be buying more Haflingers. I wear a size 8, the pair I bought are a size 8 [Euro size 39]. The are a little wider than normal shoes but no wider than other shoes of like brands [Birkenstocks]. I'm happy with this purchase and will be buying more Haflinger shoes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Poll

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes...but for the younger set.
customer_reviews.text: Wore these many years ago and since bending over to untie shoes is a problem now (I'm OLD...86) thought these would fill the bill. Unfortunately, though they are well made and I used to love them, I find they are just too hard to walk in and keep on my feet. I bought the correct size but I think my foot is either narrower than it was or less flexible or something. Good shoes...yes, I recommend, but guess I've out lived their usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: PatD

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM. they aren't the prettiest
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or fourth pare of haflinger grizzlies. I LOVE THEM. they aren't the prettiest, but they are super comfy and I can wear them to drive the kids to school in my slippers. Eventually, the felt will wear thru ... and I"ll probably get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: patti s

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers
customer_reviews.text: We have been wearing this brand of slipper for years. They wear well, are nice and warm even without socks... They are well made- have indoor-outdoor soles... overall just great slippers.. They are very spendy for slippers but we feel they are worth the price...
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinegirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: "For years I've worn Stegmann clogs but they just aren't available anymore. I was a little afraid to buy Haflinger clogs because I'd never heard of them personally. I decided to give it a try so I took a chance and ordered the Haflinger clog. I really didn't need to worry, they are just what I wanted! The quality is great and I can wear them throughout the day and that's a real miracle for me.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous support--and now fits wide feet even better
customer_reviews.text: I've loved my old pair of this same clog--and I"m thrilled that they have adjusted the sizing so that it's a tad bit wider than my original pair and requires no breaking in/stretching in order to wear thicker socks and fit my high instep and wide size!!
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these slippers I have bought and I adore them! They are so comfortable! I wear them most days all day long (I work from home) and they are like pajamas for your feet. They lasted a good two years with that kind of constant wear. Now I use my old ones as back-ups for the quick run to the recycle bin out back.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive but they are the only type of house shoe that we bother with anymore. They have a hard sole that works well on our stone floors and keeps you from slipping. You can wear them outdoors easily and I sometimes do. The wool is very warm and conforms to your foot after awhile. We’ve bought multple pairs of this style and love them. They are also one of the few house shoes that fit my husband.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Footwear
customer_reviews.text: Love my Haflingers have worn them for over 10 years and won't give them up. Fit like a glove and look good casual or dress. Have several pairs. Wear them everyday and they last and last. Product was delivered as promised and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Emscowboy

customer_reviews.title: skrimping on felt makes them feel loose
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of boiled wool / felt clogs was made by Daniel Green. They look almost exactly like these except that the opening on these is a full inch longer, so the top of the clog is now at about the center of the top of my arch (felt on these is approx 4.5" while on the last pair it was 5.5" long). This shortening of the wool leaves the entire shoe feeling like it's too large, though the overall length is accurate and I don't think they're actually wider than my original pair. I'm disappointed... It feels like they're saving money on materials and cheapening the shoe, but the price isn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: I have long been a fan of Haflinger Clogs. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have long been a fan of Haflinger Clogs. I have had trouble figuring out the sizing. I returend and re-order three times before I got the proper fit. Hopefully, this will help someone: Normally I wear an 11.5 in most shoes (New Balance, Ecco, Footjoy) but in Haflinger I discovered the size that fits me is European size 43 (chart says thats US size Men's 10.) Yes, Haflingers run large. If you can get the right size, your foot will gradually settle gradually into the cork base and the wool upper will feel very friendly. Start by ordering one full size smaller than your nomal size.
customer_reviews.author: W.D.Vancil

customer_reviews.title: ... of Haflinger Grizzleys for years and this pair fits like the previous pairs that I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing this size of Haflinger Grizzleys for years and this pair fits like the previous pairs that I've owned. The clogs are very comfortable and provide the support I need (don't have to wear my orthotics with them). I wear the clogs all the time in the house as slippers to preserve their longevity since they tend to be expensive. I did notice that the cork looking part of the clog feels "rubberized" where my previous pair felt like cork. Not sure if it's a coating over the cork but it has the same look and did not add any additional weight to the clog.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Unraveling
customer_reviews.text: I really like these EXCEPT that the trim began to unravel after less than 2 months of use. Amazon told me to contact the company regarding the issue as the return window has closed. I have contacted Haflinger twice without a response. I expected more from a very expensive pair of slippers.
customer_reviews.author: spero

customer_reviews.title: Buying a second pair at my husband’s request.
customer_reviews.text: These have arch support I need. They fit nicely and are effortless to slip on hands-free. I bought mine so long ago I can’t remember and they’re still in great shape. My husband just asked me to get him a pair as well. I sometimes wear them to the store and no one notices. They are fine for walking in the yard. A++
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I've ever owned (I'm 73).
customer_reviews.text: I thought my Crocs were comfortable... and they are. But this shoe beats them by a mile. Bought my daughter a couple of pair, and she agrees. On my second pair now, as the first is beginning to wear out after daily use. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Long

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: I actually meant to purchase the next size up, but these fit well enough...I wear them ALL THE TIME summer, winter, spring and fall.....I have to put a piece of leather where my big toes hit, lest my nails penetrate the wool....
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Best house shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these as my house shoes/slippers for years. Nothing better for the colder months here in Northern California (meaning, it's not super cold just rainy and chilly) Plenty of room for socks and the best arch support ever. Great for standing and cooking for instance. I get a new pair every two years as I wear them out. Also great to have the indoor outdoor sole so you can step outside with them. I wear an 8.5 in shoes/boots and the 38 fits great.
customer_reviews.author: legally red9Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: First Haflinger ever to return
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mom to replace her Haflinger she had for over 10 years. I too owned a Haflinger for over 10 years. Haflinger is known for the quality and that it's made in Germany. Anyway, my mom received her new pair. She said one clog was wider than the other. As she was walking, her foot slipped out of the clog. And, there was a staple or needle protruding center of back heel area . Returned immediately. Also, my mom noticed on box that this is made in Ukraine. Reason for lesser quality?
customer_reviews.author: Hula Hands

customer_reviews.title: True to size and great quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES these shoes. He found them to be true to size and great quality. He wears them everywhere (inside and out) as they are so easy to slip on and can be worn into the office as well as more casual
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: size means nothing
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these before> just got around to wearing them (from and order at the end of October 2018) and they are bigger than the normal size. I was not aware that Amazon Prime changed their return rules so I'm stuck with them. Pay close attention to Amazon prime changing rules!!
customer_reviews.author: sheila conroy

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love Haflinger shoes. I've been dealing with foot/knee/hip pains for some time that has been diagnosed as due to the way I walk. I've found that arch support & a firm footbed in shoes takes care of my problems & Haflinger shoes provide this. I love the roomy toebox as well. I had borrowed this shoe in black so I decided to buy my own pair in gray. The neutral color actually goes well with any casual pant color I wear. As I live in the Derp South, though, I just wish Haflinger made a hot weather shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sims

customer_reviews.title: Love it; wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: So, these are so comfortable! I just wish that the felt would last longer--or at least long enough to match the lifespan of the cork foot bed. I only wear these indoors in the winter time--and I get two winters of use before they really become tattered. I've resorted to wrapping them with black duct tape to make them last one year longer, but can't say it makes them look all that great. It's a lot to spend on a shoe with limited durability, but they're so comfortable for someone who's on my feet a lot (I use them while I do massage therapy), so I bite the bullet and buy them when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: ZENmama

customer_reviews.title: Too Small After Years of The Same Size
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this style Haflinger for years and have ordered the size 42 each time. This is the first time the shoe was too small. A few weeks later my wife had the same experience with another Haflinger model that she has worn for several years. Her traditional size was too small. You'll have to draw your own conclusions but it is comforting to have a no hassle return/exchange policy.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: ultra comf
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love these slippers! i got these as house slippers because i have plantar fascitis and wanted a really good, supportive slipper for at home. i admit i have worn these out of the house on several occasions during dry weather. the sole reminds me of a birkenstock sole but i don't want to risk getting caught in the rain or ruining the soles, although they are so comfortable it is hard to want to take them off when leaving home! they have great support and my foot pain has dramatically reduced since starting to wear these! would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this slipper
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought me a pair over 20 years ago. They finally, met their end early this year and I was devastated. My replacements pair are as wonderful as the original, comfy, great arch support, and I can wear them outside to get the paper in the snow. I bought a pair for my husband and he loves his as much as I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: karen malhiot

customer_reviews.title: Great house shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my house shoes. Wish they were a bit softer or cushier. I love the arch support. I need all the support I can get due to spine issues. So I do appreciate these a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina W

customer_reviews.title: Quality wool clogs
customer_reviews.text: I love Haflinger clogs. They are quality footwear and fabulously comfortable. I appreciate felted wool clogs as they are warm in winter and water resistant for our rainy weather. Really they are wonderful. I'm planning to get another pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: ivbell

customer_reviews.title: perfect slipper!
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Love this clog- very comfy!!! They keep my feet nice & warm, but not too warm. I use this as a house shoe, so inside only. They stay on my feel well & don't slip off. The first day I wore them, I was aware of the label sewn on the heel, but by day 2 I no longer noticed it. I read some reviews questioning the inside the shoe where it looks like the heel part is a separate piece that was sewn in... I believe it is. That area is a little bit raised- however that is where my arch falls, so I'm not even aware of the seam there. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7.5. These don’t come in half sizes and the manufacturer doesn’t offer instructions as to whether to size up or down. Usually in cases like this, the advice is to size up. I ordered them in a size 8. They’re way to big. Too bad. I would have liked them if they’d fit.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie JanLois

customer_reviews.title: Great clog.
customer_reviews.text: I like these clogs a lot I usually wear an US size 10-10.5, but these are slightly large I tried the next size down (42) and it did not work. If I wear the 43 with socks, they fit just fine. Comfortable, well made footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Orlando

customer_reviews.title: SIZE RUNS BIG
customer_reviews.text: A well made and good looking slipper/shoe. Unfortunately the fit was bigger than expected. I wear a 7.5 U.S. regular normally and the "sizer" suggested an 8. However, ia happy ending ... I gave them to my Mom who does like them and fits them better. Which meant, I did shop again.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort for high arch feet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Shoes! They are comfortable, easy slip on/off, and you can wear them with or without socks. I wear them Everywhere! The footied conformso to your foot, making this clog one of the most comfortable shoes for high arch feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kohler Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Really helped with my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: I was prescribed Halflingers by my foot doctor to help alleviate plantar fasciitis. I am now into my second pair. They really do the trick for wearing around the home.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Best in comfort slippers for indoor/outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend for Christmas after he admired my Halfinger slippers....he loves them and is in them almost constantly. Easy to slip on barefoot or with socks, and the boiled wool and cork make a great match for indoor or patio/neighborhood use. Once you wear a pair, you will be hooked for life!
customer_reviews.author: ddjdallas

customer_reviews.title: Stitching coming loose...Update
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for my Daniel Green slippers in this style that lasted many years. Since they are no longer available, I bought the Haflinger as they appeared to be of the same quality. Before two months of wear the stitching around the trim at the heels has come undone. Very disappointing, particularly for the price paid. I'll be contacting the manufacturer. Update...this is after 3 years, 8 months of wear. Though very comfortable, disappointed that lasting quality seems to be a thing of the past.
customer_reviews.author: Caren Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Arch Support, Warm Feet, Can Shovel in These
customer_reviews.text: Love Haflinger clogs - they are so comfortable and warm, super arch support, and with the solid bottom, they are great to wear while shopping or shovelling snow.
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and durabllilty
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for every day. And, they’re extremely comfortable. Make certain to purchase some cork protection. They'll last nearly a lifetime if you use it regularly. ... seller was excellent too. I received my order Tuesday but was told it would arrive the following Friday. Excellent surprise especially during the holiday sells.
customer_reviews.author: Merritt Smith Croland

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support and well made slipper
customer_reviews.text: I like these slippers as they have arch support. I am through buying cheap slippers. They do not have quite as much support as my Vionics but they are good. They are too wide for me, as my Vionic slippers are. I always wear socks with slippers so this works okay. No one seems to make a narrower slipper, even for the pretty hefty price. I ,
customer_reviews.author: Jean ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I am a lifetime Haflinger wearer. Amazon has great prices on these now and then, and it's worth the wait for these clogs. They are the best and wear well.
customer_reviews.author: windward

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these slippers for four years straight and they held up to constant use. I can wear them inside and outside. They are sturdy and keep you well positioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARM!!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are the warmest shoes I own. We heat with a wood stove so our floors are very cold. My tootsies have never been warmer., and they are comfortable, too. I wear an eight and the 8 fit just right. I have a bunion and arthritis in my second toe, and there is plenty of room in the toe box so these parts do not hurt. Buying from Amazon, the price was good and the shipping very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ponydriver

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: My favorite footwear - goes with everything, fits like it was made for me, feels cozy as a a bedroom slipper. Been buying these for about 20 years now, one pair lasts about 2 years before it needs resoling. Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Olson

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed that this pair is already showing wear when I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the item now $25 cheaper than it was when I bought it 5 weeks ago, but the sole has already started to peel apart from the cork. And I just missed the "return window" by 1 week. I have another pair of these that are over 10 years old, if not 15, and they lasted a long time. Needless to say, I'm disappointed that this pair is already showing wear when I've only worn them for a few hours. Normally great quality, so don't worry if you buy a pair, just keep an eye on that "return window"!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great support and very durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of these before and the 36 is kind of very roomy for my foot. I probably should order a child size next time. These clogs though are great and give great support.
customer_reviews.author: luciana Chapman

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: The warmth and comfort of the shoe is good I have been using them for years now . But now a days these shoes come with no arch support . This is the second pair I’m returning. Kind of annoying
customer_reviews.author: Sats

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Feel great. Happy to get my feet into these when i get home. Only con is i sometimes forget im wearing them and find myself at work having to explain my creative footwear
customer_reviews.author: GFC

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my pregnant wife. As somebody who is certified in the fitting and fabrication of foot orthotics and braces one of my go to suggested brands for people who chronic foot/pain issues
customer_reviews.author: jesse fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my plantar fasciitis, but watch the sizing
customer_reviews.text: These clogs seem to fit on the small side. I'm normally a men's 11 1/2 or 12, so I had planned on purchasing the Grizzly in a 45. Fortunately, however, I was able to try some on before I ordered, and found that I needed a 46 (supposedly a US 13). The 45 was just a little too short and narrow. The 46 fits very well. So far, I love these shoes. I bought them to wear in the house, because I have plantar fasciitis, but they're so comfortable I wish I could wear them to work. And they definitely seem to be helping the PF.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Stockdale

customer_reviews.title: Bought These To Replace My Last Pair!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these shoes for my wife because she has never found a pair of shoes that are SO comfortable. She wears them both in and out of the house, and I was pleasantly surprised how long the last pair lasted, as she wore these at work in our trucking business before we retired. But the bottom line is, they are a good fitting, comfortable all-round kind of shoe that is comparably inexpensive, though I would spend the world on my bride with ease. Happy wife, happy life ya know... (-:
customer_reviews.author: Widget

customer_reviews.title: I wear them best with my Feelmax 5 toe socks from Finland
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time keeping them on my size 6 to 6 1/2, slightly wide (C) feet. I wear them best with my Feelmax 5 toe socks from Finland. They are best with heavier cotton socks. There is no way I could even walk a few feet in them barefoot. I'd step right out. and I find the wool itchy if against my skin. Mostly, I just think they probably fit a D width better, because they are unisex, and more meant to fit a man.
customer_reviews.author: HelenLois

customer_reviews.title: Don't Look like a Slipper!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance orderning the size I did because the others I ordered that were Just Right, stretched. They work with my ankle braces. So I got a pair to have next to my bed to race to the bathroom, etc. Too small. But just as I suspected, they stretched to Just right. But that is with out any extra ankle braces added. And I have a tendency to want to wear them everywhere because they go with what I have on, look like a mule shoe and not a slipper, and have such great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: AH1

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Using as a house slipper to help ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size 9 and ordered size 8 knowing these run large. Size 8 works for me but could have gone even smaller. Love them! Using as a house slipper to help my feet not ache as they do with regular slippers. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Go Navy!

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced an 8 year old pair that was literally falling off my feet- the wool worn away in several places, leaving big holes. I wear these every day as house slippers. I've tried other cheaper slippers, but kept on wearing the holey pair because they are the most comfortable, even to wear all day, and I love that I can wear them outside if needed. Finally got a new pair for my birthday, and I love them. Four stars only for the high price.
customer_reviews.author: scj5

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted these forever! My mother had them years ago and I would always sneak out wearing them, lol. So, now that i'm all grown up, i decided to spend the money on a pair and see if they still fit they way I remembered...... YES, they fit like a glove. Comfortable, high arches, and keep my feet super warm with and without socks. I wear them everywhere. To the store, walking the dog, around the house, in the yard and they repel water (at least so far) and keep my feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: H. FISHBURN

customer_reviews.title: Unisex size runs big
customer_reviews.text: These clogs are very well made and have great arch support but they were much too big -- too wide and too long. I wear a women's size 8 and ordered the Euro size 39 which is usually the equivalent of an 8. I had to send them back and get the size 38, which fits perfectly. The navy color is very nice and the felt is warm and breathable. No sweaty feet. The only improvement would be if the insole had a bit more cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Great clog
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 in all shoes, I ordered a size 9 and they fit perfect. True to size. This is my first time buying Haflinger clogs, I love the style and the fit!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Runs wide for Women’s normal size.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to have the Grizzly but this clog just doesn’t hit my arch in the right place, and since it is Unisex, it runs a bit wider than Women’s normal. I will return them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Messmore

customer_reviews.title: Fall Apart very fast
customer_reviews.text: The slippers came with a sole that was different than the one pictured. So I had to have them resoled. After about 3 months of wear they began to fall apart. The wool started to slowly tear malformed. Not worth the money at all. These slippers should cost about 15 dollars for their quality.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel j f mason

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy construction
customer_reviews.text: Glue seeped out between the pieces of felt on the footbed of the right slipper and hardened making the slipper uncomfortable to wear. For the price I expect better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: ch

product_meta.title: Haflinger unisex-adult GZ Classic Grizzly Clog
product_meta.description:
HAFLINGER UNISEX GRIZZLY CLASSIC WOOL CLOGS Enjoy the German casual style and unmatched comfort of the Haflinger GZ Classic Grizzly Wool Clog. The uppers are made of soft, boiled wool felt to keep your feet at a constant temperature whether it is warm or cold. Traditional Bavarian trim adorns the uppers for added style. The low backed casual clog style makes it easy to slip in and out, while the rounded, roomy toe box combines with an anatomically correct footbed for unmatched comfort. Soft woolfelt lines the inside and footbed of this clog, helping to wick away moisture and keep a healthy foot environment. The cork and latex midsole adds a defined arch for the support needed for long days. The rubber outsole is great for indoor or outdoor wear. See why people love their Haflinger clogs by trying the one that started it all, the Haflinger GZ15 Classic Grizzly Wool clog.The Haflinger philosophy is simple and logical—a healthy foot needs the proper environment and a properly designed walking surface to stay healthy. Haflinger clogs and boiled wool slippers pay particular attention to the needs of your foot—space to expand and contract freely and effectively; breathable, all-natural materials; a footbed and spacious toe box that follow the natural form of the foot; and an impact surface that compliments and fortifies human foot design.

The GZ Classic Grizzly Clog from Haflinger is a beautiful and thoughtfully designed casual shoe made for everyday comfort. It has many features to promote the health and proper alignment of your feet. This clog has a contoured heel seat, a wool-felt inside lining for moisture absorption, a cork-latex footbed with arch support, a rocker heel, and a roomy toe box with a toe bar. The outsole is non-skid for greater stability indoors and out. Not to be forgotten is the 100-percent wool felt upper which keeps you feet at an ideal temperature in warm or cold weather.

Founded 50 years ago as a family-owned business, Haflinger is the largest manufacturer of boiled wool in Germany. Run by the grandson of the founder, Haflinger is known in many international markets for not only its boiled wool slippers and wool felt clogs, but more importantly for its outstanding quality and workmanship. In 1991 Gerda Hoehm began importing Haflinger into the U.S. and Canada and the company has since doubled and tripled sales from year to year--our footwear has been extremely well received in North America. Although the recipe for reliable footwear and superior wool has not changed since the early days of Haflinger, the line has evolved its product offering to include a range of styles--children's slippers and clogs, wool-felt cork-bottom clogs, hard- and soft-sole slippers, and our newest sandal and clog line, the Trend Collection. Whether you prefer the classic Grizzly clog, our breathable, comfortable boiled-wool slippers, or our fresh, new Trend styles, Haflinger footwear consistently treats your feet to the best!. Care-Use a soft brush to remove any dirt or debris that has accumulated

See more
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately not_applicable from arch
